name: Ethernal
public_notice: The smart-contract owner can mint new tokens, please proceed with caution.

description.en:
$ETHERNAL is an algorithmic stable token pegged 1:1 to $ETH on Aurora blockchain. $ETHERNAL is our fourth pegged token in Polaris ecosystem with more tokens coming in the future.

$ETHERNAL is designed to follow the price of $ETH while pushing the price up and down to keep it close to the peg.
